snippet: Tara O’Con and Jodi Bender danced “Underneath Where We Are” amid lunchtime downtown office workers, drawing various kinds of attention.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews dance performance by Tara O'Con and Jodi Bender in the courtyard of 77 Water Street as part of the River to River Festival.
lead_paragraph: Tara O’Con and Jodi Bender danced “Underneath Where We Are” amid lunchtime downtown office workers, drawing various kinds of attention.

headline.seo: Tara O’Con’s ‘Underneath Where We Are,’ at River to River
headline.main: Two Women, All in Red, Stretching Lunchtime
headline.print_headline: Two Women, All in Red, Stretching Lunchtime
